researchers.post: Hi Stephen, I'm sure we have never met though I was with Channel 10 in Perth (Good Morning Perth and my Magic Show on Saturday Mornings) in 1989/90.I enjoyed your article and have been involved with the Shroud research for over 20 years. My book on the Shroud ("In The Image Of His God" ISBN 978-1-4327-2878-6 was launched at the Shroud Convention in Ohio last October. Rex Morgan is a dear friend. You may enjoy my web site http://shroudresearch.com or http://worldofunexplainedmysteries.com Sincere regardsPeterDr. Peter J. Shield PhD,ARP
